answers.answer: They will probably just make you do the 3 hour glucose test.  I didnt pass my 1 hour but i did pass my 3 hour hour.  Im sure your fine, your doctor will tell you what he wants to do next.

Same thing happened to me.  I was 6 points over the highest score you could get (146 ...out of 140 ><).  So, like star_girl said, they will probably make you go for the longer 3 hour test.  I went for it, and passed.  I only had one abnormal number and you need at least two to be diagnosed with Gestational Diabetes.Good luck with your test!  Keep us posted!

question: Hi All,I am now 29 weeks pregnant with our baby boy George. i did my 1 Hour Glucose test last week and it was a little bit higher than the normal.but Glucose in my blood before taking the glucose syrop is lowand glucose in the urine is negative.i am really worried that i might have diabetes. i am 33 years old and i am a small person. with my baby i weight 62KG.  i called my doctor twice and till now his assistant did not show him my results.i need your advise. please help me
title: Gestational screen 1 Hr high
